thread.title: A Very Murray Christmas Trailer Teases the Best Night Ever
thread.title_full: A Very Murray Christmas Trailer Teases the Best Night Ever | Maxim

author: Ellen Killoran
title: A Very Murray Christmas Trailer Teases the Best Night Ever
text:
Christmas came early when Netflix dropped a teaser for the upcoming holiday special, A Very Murray Christmas , which reunites Lost In Translation director Sophia Coppola and star Bill Murray .
Billed as a "homage to the classic variety show," Murray is joined by a who's who of sketch comedy â€” Amy Poehler, Maya Rudolph, Chris Rock, Michael Cera, and musical guest Miley Cyrus (we're pretty sure that's her and Murray on vocals in the trailer soundtrack). Even George Clooney makes an appearance, because apparently Hollywood isn't allowed to do anything without him.
That said, this is the first time we're actually looking forward to the winter. A Very Murray Christmas premieres on Netflix on December 4.
